patthana14.19:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana14.19:0.3_0: For he depends on to continue, and to make a sound.
patthana14.19:1.1_0: Completely understanding the teaching, not for the sake of perception ...
patthana14.19:1.1_1: fugal causes. Sensual phenomena donâ€™t give rise to diversity of elements. ...
patthana14.19:1.1_3: The causes and conditions for the arising of thought ...
patthana14.19:1.1_4: The hindrances are a cause: this is a condition for the origin of the world.
